data.title: Alvin Ailey at New York City Center
data.meta_description: Experience Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater at New York City Center. See classics alongside premieres & new productions. Tickets from $32—view schedule.
data.text:
Thank you for joining us at New York City Center. We can't wait to welcome you back soon.

See Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater perform at the BAAND Together Dance Festival, July 30–August 3, 2024.

Get Tickets Today

For 65 years, Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater has showcased the work of diverse choreographers, amplifying a wide range of voices alongside Mr. Ailey’s own. During this milestone anniversary season, the Company will expand on that tradition, introducing Amy Hall Garner and Elizabeth Roxas-Dobrish to the repertory with world premieres CENTURY and Me, Myself and You, which is commissioned by City Center.

New productions of Ronald K. Brown's Dancing Spirit (2009), Alonzo King's Following the Subtle Current Upstream (2000), Jamar Roberts' Ode (2019), and Hans van Manen's Solo (1997), as well as a new version of Ailey Classics spanning the breadth of Mr. Ailey’s rich catalog, round out the calendar. The season will also pay tribute to the women who have made Ailey what it is today, notably with the Opening Night Gala celebrating Artistic Director Emerita Judith Jamison in her 80th year, and a one-night-only “Pioneering Women of Ailey” program honoring trailblazers Carmen de Lavallade, Judith Jamison, Denise Jefferson, and Sylvia Waters. On select programs, the thrill of live music will enhance favorite Ailey works including Revelations, Night Creature, and excerpts of Pas de Duke, Masekela Langage, Opus McShann, Love Songs, For ‘Bird’ – With Love, and Reflections in D.

In a return to pre-pandemic tradition, the magic of Ailey will shine at New York City Center for a full five weeks, giving audiences the opportunity to once again celebrate the holidays with Ailey. Check the schedule online for program details or download a copy of the calendar.

Programs, casting, and prices are subject to change without notice.

En Face Magazine is the publisher of Ailey's City Center 2023 program book. Click here for advertising opportunities.

View the cast for each performance

Programs, casting, and prices are subject to change without notice.

Online

Tickets are available to purchase at nycitycenter.org.

By Phone

212-581-1212

Hours: MON–SAT Noon–8pm; SUN Noon–7:30pm

Handling fees for online and phone orders:

$7.00 per ticket when ordering seats for one performance or $20 per Super Fan order when ordering tickets for two or more performances at same time.

At the Box Office

New York City Center

131 West 55th Street (btwn 6th & 7th Aves)

Hours: MON–SAT Noon–8pm; SUN Noon–7:30pm

NOTE: The box office will be closed on Thursday, November 23 for Thanksgiving.

No handling fees for tickets purchased at the box office.

A $3.00 facility fee will be added to each ticket, including those purchased at the box office.

Group Tickets

For more information on groups of 10 or more, please visit alvinailey.org/group-sales

To purchase tickets or for assistance planning your group of 10+ visit, email groupsales@alvinailey.org or call 212-405-9082.

Hours: Monday–Friday, Noon–7pm

A $3.00 facility fee will be added to the cost of each ticket.

Refunds

All sales are final. There will be no refunds on group or single tickets. Customers can donate or exchange only.

Exchanges

All exchanges must be made within 48 hours of either the original performance date or the requested performance date, whichever is sooner.

There will be a $15 per ticket exchange fee charged for all single ticket orders. All exchanges must be for a different performance date of the event originally purchased. New York City Center does not permit exchanges from one event to another.

Bring a Group

Groups of 10+ save BIG! Gather 10 or more of your family, friends, or colleagues to see Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater return to New York City Center this December and enjoy amazing benefits. Save up to 20% on tickets, pay no services fees, and receive a discounted package to take a private group class at the Ailey Studios.

Learn More

Contact us for details and assistance planning your group visit by emailing groupsales@alvinailey.org or calling 212-405-9082.

Be a Super Fan

Can’t get enough Ailey? Save 20% when you order tickets for two or more performances! The discount will be automatically applied when you order tickets online, over the phone at 212-581-1212, or in person at the City Center box office.

*Offer does not apply to $32 tickets. Discount applies to performances purchased together in one order. Subject to availability. Cannot be combined with any other offer nor applied retroactively.

Become a Member

Join today to support Ailey’s artistic and educational programs while enjoying members-only benefits.

Friends of Alvin Ailey

Join the Friends of Alvin Ailey with a gift of $150+ and receive 20% off tickets originally priced $80-$142 to see Ailey at New York City Center.* Plus, Ailey members who give $800 or less are invited to enjoy VIP Lounge access this season by inviting a friend to become a member. Referral link provided upon donation.

With a membership gift of $800+, you will have access to join the Ailey community in the VIP Lounge during intermissions throughout the New York City Center engagement.

Become a Friend of Ailey

Ailey Partners

With a membership gift of $1,750+, you will be recognized as an Ailey Parter and enjoy access to two complimentary tickets for a special Ailey Partners Night performance and backstage tour at New York City Center. Ailey Partners may purchase additional premier house seats and enjoy VIP Lounge access during New York City engagements, as well as in tour cities across the country when applicable.

Become an Ailey Partner

*Friends of Alvin Ailey 20% apply to tickets regularly priced $80-142 that are purchased through December 22, 2023. Limit 6 tickets per performance. Valid for all performances except the Opening Night Gala performance. Standard service and facility fees apply.

Use the Student Discount

$15 student tickets are available from 12 noon until curtain time on the day of each performance.

Subject to availability; may not be purchased online or by phone. A valid student ID must be presented at the Box Office. Limit one ID per person; one ticket per ID. Restrictions may apply.

Use the Young New York Discount

Are you between the ages 21-35? Save 50% on tickets $80+* using promo code MODERN. Available for all performances November 29–December 31, 2023.

*Proof of age required. Person purchasing tickets must be age 21–35; guests can be any age. Tickets purchased online or on the phone will only be available for pick up at the box office. Discount cannot be combined with other discounts. Limit 4 tickets. No retroactive discounts. All seats subject to availability. Regular service fees apply. No refunds or exchanges.
